summary: Phase 1 testing completed. Backend API tests 100% pass (20/20 tests). Fixed critical authentication bug in export/delete endpoints. Frontend requires Google Auth to test UI but code review shows proper implementation.

critical.issue: FIXED: Endpoints used 'session_id' cookie instead of 'session_token' which is used everywhere else, causing authentication to fail

passed_tests: ✅ All 7 categories present: chest(23), back(31), legs(37), shoulders(24), arms(26), core(24), cardio(15)
✅ Category filtering works for all categories
✅ Frontend login page loads correctly with FITQUEST branding
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: server.py lines 880-940 - export_user_data and delete_user_account were using 'session_id' cookie instead of 'session_token'. Changed to use the same auth pattern as get_current_user() function.
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_phase1.py - New test file for Phase 1 features

success_rate.frontend: Code review passed - requires Google Auth to test UI interactively

seed_data_creation: 180 exercises already seeded via startup event in server.py
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 backend fully tested with 180 exercises. Fixed critical auth bug in export/delete endpoints. Categories: legs=37, back=31, arms=26, core=24, shoulders=24, chest=23, cardio=15. Frontend requires Google Auth - code review shows CardioIntervalConfig, CardioRoundConfig, ExerciseConfigDialog components properly implemented for cardio interval training. Danger Zone has export-data-btn and delete-account-btn with proper confirmation dialog.

export.functionality: Returns JSON with user profile, workouts, logs, meals, weight entries, performance records

delete.functionality: Deletes user and all associated data, clears session_token cookie

components: CardioIntervalConfig - Configure individual intervals with duration, intensity min/max, description
CardioRoundConfig - Configure rounds with repeat_count, recovery_minutes, and multiple intervals
ExerciseConfigDialog - Main dialog that handles both strength and cardio exercise configuration

bugs_fixed_by_testing_agent.description: Fixed authentication in export_user_data and delete_user_account endpoints - changed from session_id to session_token cookie, added Authorization header support, changed database query from session_id to session_token
